name: Ufogo mission
description:
Ufogo mission

This game is one of the action games and the aim of this game is to defeat all the waves until they to defeat the final boss.

How to play Ufogo Mission

To move you have to click where you want the character to go only up and down and not left and right and if you are from a pc you have to use (w) and (s) and to shoot you have to hold down in the direction you want but be careful there is one specific area where you can aim ie half screen. To buy stuff or improve it you have to go to the shop and the up arrow means that you have to improve it and the other button to buy (obviously you have to have the money by killing the enemies).

Language

This game is English and cannot be changed.
